resources.string:
A probably dangerous website has been detected. 
We strongly advise you not to visit this web page. 
If you feel this is an error or if you want to visit the website anyways, you can do so. 
 
Do you want to continue loading this web page?
Reload the page to make sure that the content is displayed correctly

The SSL certificate of this website could not be verified, is invalid or another error occurred while handling SSL. It is not recommended submitting personal and sensitive information to insecure websites. Do you want to continue loading this web page? Note that if you continue now, any SSL error that occurs on the same website will be ignored for this session.
